text: too hee raat ko (badha ke) din mein daakhil kar deta hai (to) raat badh jaatee hai aur too hee din ko (badha ke) raat mein daakhil karata hai (to din badh jaata hai) too hee bejaan (anda nutfa vagairah) se jaanadaar ko paida karata hai aur too hee jaanadaar se bejaan nutfa (vagairaha) nikaalata hai aur too hee jisako chaahata hai behisaab rozee deta hai
